archimate:Node.name: [L1 Base] Comcam DMCS and Misc Provisioning (node)
archimate:Node.documentation: This logical Node provides provisioning Provisioning for the Base DMCS and associated processes that constitute the "Head Node" applicaitions, The system will fail if this provisioning infrastructure fails as all applications are critical to operations. Hardware designers might consider redundant provisioning for this logical system element.
